  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Annotation
    The Annotation class stores the spectral x and pixel y values of an annotation text along with its text
    AwtColoredAnnotation
    ColoredAnnotation is a label on the spectrum; not an integralRegion
    AwtDialog  
    AwtOverlayLegendDialog
    Dialog for showing the legend or key for overlaid plots in a JSVPanel.
    AwtPanel
    JSVPanel class represents a View combining one or more GraphSets, each with one or more JDXSpectra.
    AwtParameters  
    AwtPopupMenu
    Popup Menu for JSVPanel.
    AwtPrintLayoutDialog
    Dialog to set print preferences for JSpecview.
    CoordComparator  
    Coordinate
    The Coordinate class stores the x and y values of a coordinate.
    DialogHelper
    just a class I made to separate the construction of the AnnotationDialogs from their use
    Integral  
    IntegralComparator  
    IntegralData
    from IntegralGraph a data structure for integration settings
    Interface  
    JDXDataObject
    spectrum data AS READ FROM FILE
    JDXHeader
    could be a spectrum or a source
    JDXSpectrum
    JDXSpectrum implements the Interface Spectrum for the display of JDX Files.
    JSVDropTargetListener  
    JSVersion  
    JSVFileFilter
    A implementation of the FileFilter that filters out all files except those with extensions that are added.
    JSViewer
    This static class encapsulates all general functionality of applet and app.
    JSVPanelNode  
    JSVTree  
    JSVTreeNode  
    Measurement
    The Measurement class stores an annotation that is a measurement
    MeasurementData  
    PanelData
    JSVPanel class draws a plot from the data contained a instance of a Graph.
    Parameters
    This a representation of the Display Scheme for the spectral display.
    PdfCreator  
    PeakData
    a data structure for peak lists
    PeakInfo  
    PeakPick  
    PeakPickEvent  
    PrintLayout
    PrintLayout class stores all the information needed from the PrintLayoutDialog
    RepaintManager  
    ScaleData
    Stores information about scale and range that JSVPanel needs to to display a graph with a single plot.
    ScriptCommandTokenizer  
    SubSpecChangeEvent  
    ViewDialog
    Dialog for managing overlaying spectra and closing files
    ViewPanel  
    Visible
    Visible class - for prediction of colour from visible spectrum
    ZoomEvent
